sentences.en: All sediment deposition is not injurious.
sentences.cn: 所有的泥沙淤积并不都是有害的.

sentences.en: He's never done anything injurious to morals.
sentences.cn: 他从未做过任何伤风败俗的事.

sentences.en: His behavior is injurious to the interests of the vast majority of people.
sentences.cn: 他的行为有损于大多数人民的利益.

sentences.en: It is extremely injurious to plants and tends to destroy them.
sentences.cn: 它极大地危害作物甚至损毁庄稼.

sentences.en: Name five species of injurious insects, and tell how to control them.
sentences.cn: 说出五种致伤的昆虫, 并指出如何去防止被它们所伤.

sentences.en: Put like this , it was no different from other work, neither immoral nor injurious to health.
sentences.cn: 在名分上, 那名称与别的工作同样, 既不和道德相冲突,也并不违反健康.

sentences.en: Reading while riding in a car is injurious to one's eyes.
sentences.cn: 在汽车上看书容易损害眼睛.

sentences.en: Stress in itself is not necessarily injurious.
That these processes are often injurious to the fertility of a plant cannot be doubted.
sentences.cn: 这些做法对于植物的能育性常有损害,这一点是无可置疑的.

sentences.en: The argument that smoking is injurious has become accepted.
sentences.cn: 吸烟有害的说法已过接受.

sentences.en: The drought periods under these conditions tend to be more injurious to the trees.
sentences.cn: 旱季干旱伤害果树较大.

sentences.en: The frost is injurious to the plants.
The injurious mechanism of alkaline burn of cornea has always been concerned.
sentences.cn: 角膜碱烧伤作为一种常见的致盲性眼病,其损伤机制一直为人们所关注.

sentences.en: There were a total of 228 cases of self - injurious behavior.
sentences.cn: 研究中发现总共有228例 自我 伤害行为.

sentences.en: Use your imagination, but ensure that it is not injurious.
sentences.cn: 运用你的想象力, 但是要确保不会伤害到幼犬.

trans.tran_cn: 伤害的，中伤的，不公正的
